function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Accessibility via stairs limits access for individuals with mobility restrictions, increasing the risk of excluding this group from the space.","Impact":"Excludes individuals with mobility restrictions from accessing the space, reducing inclusivity and diversity.","Mitigation":"Installation of ramps or elevators to provide alternative access for individuals with mobility restrictions.","Technologies":"Ramp installation, elevator systems","People":"Individuals with mobility restrictions","Owner":"Property management or developers"},{"Description":"High population density in urban areas increases the risk of contagious disease transmission.","Impact":"Increased potential for the spread of contagious diseases in densely populated urban areas.","Mitigation":"Implementation of public health measures, vaccination campaigns, and improved sanitation and hygiene practices.","Technologies":"Sanitation systems, air filtration systems, public health monitoring technologies","People":"Residents, visitors, and workers in the urban area","Owner":"City authorities, public health organizations, and residents"},{"Description":"Implementation of urban agriculture may increase the risk of foodborne illnesses if proper hygiene and sanitation practices are not followed.","Impact":"Risk of foodborne illnesses due to inadequate hygiene and sanitation practices in urban agriculture.","Mitigation":"Training programs for urban agriculture practitioners, implementation of food safety standards, regular inspection of urban agriculture facilities.","Technologies":"Hygiene monitoring systems, food safety testing equipment","People":"Urban agriculture practitioners, consumers of urban agriculture products","Owner":"Urban agriculture organizations, public health agencies"}]}
